ITEMS.label: Courses
ITEMS.description: Explore our extensive collection of courses designed to help you master various subjects and skills. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, there's something here for everyone.

ITEMS.label: Learn live
ITEMS.description: Join us for our free workshops, webinars, and other events to learn more about our programs and get started on your journey to becoming a developer.

ITEMS.label: Learning library
ITEMS.description: For all the self-taught geeks out there, here is our content library with most of the learning materials we have produced throughout the years.

subMenu.label: Read and watch
subMenu.description: It makes sense to start learning by reading and watching videos about fundamentals and how things work.

subMenu.label: Practice interactively
subMenu.description: Curated list of small interactive and incremental exercises you can take to get better at any coding skill.

subMenu.label: Build projects
subMenu.description: Curated section of projects to build while learning with simple instructions, videos, solutions, and more.

subMenu.label: How to's?
subMenu.description: Guides on different topics related to the technologies that we teach in our courses

white-label-version-items.label: More ways of learning
white-label-version-items.description: Miami Tech Works is part of 4Geeks learning community. Go to 4Geeks.com for more interactive lessons, workshops, mentorhips, and learning with AI.
